[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Cross-Function] [Tau Leakage via Proofs] Can an attacker recover tau by collecting multiple valid digests and proofs across different rounds and solving a system of equations? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Cross-Function] [Batch Size Manipulation] Can an attacker create a DigestKey with small capacity but then serialize/deserialize it to bypass capacity checks in digest()? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Cross-Function] [Concurrent Access] Are DigestKey operations thread-safe? Can concurrent calls to digest() or verify() cause race conditions? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Cross-Function] [Memory Zeroization] After DigestKey is dropped, is the sensitive tau value properly zeroized from memory, or could it remain accessible? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Cross-Function] [Digest Collision] Can two different ID sets produce the same digest value, allowing substitution attacks? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Integer Arithmetic] [Usize Overflow] Can the cast from u64 to usize at line 111 in digest() overflow on 32-bit systems, causing wrong round indexing? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Integer Arithmetic] [Capacity Overflow] Can batch_size * num_rounds overflow when computing total tau powers needed, causing insufficient memory allocation? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Field Arithmetic] [Zero Division] Can any operations result in division by zero in field arithmetic? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Field Arithmetic] [Scalar Field Mismatch] Do all Fr scalars belong to the correct scalar field for the elliptic curve, or could mismatched field elements cause issues? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Group Operations] [Subgroup Membership] Are all G1 and G2 elements validated to be in the correct prime-order subgroup, or could small-subgroup attacks bypass verification? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Group Operations] [Point Addition Overflow] Can repeated point additions in MSM operations overflow or produce invalid results for extreme inputs? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [Group Operations] [Invalid Point Arithmetic] Can operations on invalid curve points (not on the curve) proceed without detection? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/digest.rs] [MSM] [Empty MSM] What happens when msm() is called with empty vectors? Does it return None, identity, or error? (Medium)
